summary: April 20 is the 110th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Rachel Joy Scott  was an American student and the first murder victim of the Columbine High School massacre, which claimed the lives of 12 students and a teacher, as well as both perpetrators.
She has since been the subject of several books and is the inspiration for Rachel's Challenge, a nationwide school outreach program for the prevention of teen violence, based on her life and writings.
title: Rachel Joy Scott
